Text: Thanks for uploading this, I guess, but it is incomplete! Especially the ONLY new track in this compilation (Track 31, Remembering) was THE interesting thing about this. Probably assembled from the original albums or other compilations. And many tracks have audio glitches.

Indeed, this is not a rip from the new compilation but a mishmash of previously available mp3s. The Blade Runner Intro is off the 1994 album, not the extended version in the Collection. Why making us waste our time with this? Stay away from this torrent.
